**Please note, Public Notices prior to 2025 may be requested at City Hall.**

![](https://sansabatexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/public-notices.png)

**The City Council of the City of San Saba, Texas, has scheduled its next regularly monthly meeting on
*Tuesday, January 13th, beginning at 6:00 p.m.*
in the Council Chambers, 303 S. Clear.**
**[Meeting Agenda](https://sansabatexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2026/01/agenda011326.pdf)**

**The City Council of the City of San Saba, Texas, has scheduled its next regularly monthly meeting on
*Tuesday, December 9th, beginning at 6:00 p.m.*
in the Council Chambers, 303 S. Clear.**
**[Meeting Agenda](https://sansabatexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/12/agenda120925.pdf)**

**The City Council of the City of San Saba, Texas, has scheduled a special called meeting on
*Wednesday, November 12th, beginning at 6:00 p.m.*
in the Council Chambers, 303 S. Clear.**
**[Meeting Agenda](https://sansabatexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/11/agenda101125-canceled.pdf)**

**The City Council of the City of San Saba, Texas, has cancelled its next regularly monthly meeting on
*Tuesday, November 11th, beginning at 6:00 p.m.*
in the Council Chambers, 303 S. Clear.**
**[Meeting Agenda](https://sansabatexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/11/agenda101125-canceled.pdf)**

**The City Council of the City of San Saba, Texas, has scheduled its next regularly monthly meeting and budget workshop on
*Tuesday, October 14th, beginning at 6:00 p.m.*
in the Council Chambers, 303 S. Clear.**
**[Meeting Agenda](https://sansabatexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/10/agenda101425.pdf)**

**The City Council of the City of San Saba, Texas, has scheduled its next regularly monthly meeting and budget workshop on
*Tuesday, September 9th, beginning at 6:00 p.m.*
in the Council Chambers, 303 S. Clear.**
**[Meeting Agenda](https://sansabatexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/agenda090925.pdf)**

**The City of San Saba will hold a Public Hearing on
*Tuesday, September 9th, beginning at 6:00 p.m.*
in the City Council Chambers at City Hall, 303 S Clear Street, San Saba, Texas, regarding the City’s proposed budget for the Fiscal Year, October 1, 2025, to September 30, 2026. The public hearing is to provide citizens of the City of San Saba the opportunity to express their views on the proposed budget and tax rate.**
[**Public Hearing Notice**](https://sansabatexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/08/Public-Hearing-Proposed-Budget-FY-2025-2026.pdf)
|
[**Proposed Budget Summary**](https://sansabatexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/08/budget25_26_proposed.pdf)

**The City Council of the City of San Saba, Texas, has scheduled its next regularly monthly meeting and budget workshop on
*Tuesday, August 12th, beginning at 6:00 p.m.*
in the Council Chambers, 303 S. Clear.**
**[Meeting Agenda](https://sansabatexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/08/agenda-workshop081225.pdf)**

**Public Notice | Notice is hereby given that the City of San Saba’s On-line Payment Service will be unavailable on July 9, 2025, due to necessary system updates. City Hall Utility Department will not be able to accept in-person payments on July 9th unless you have your mail-out bill available.**
**[Read More…](https://sansabatexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/Public-Notice-Temporary-Payment-Interruption.pdf)**

**The City Council of the City of San Saba, Texas, has scheduled its next regularly monthly meeting on
*Tuesday, July 8th, beginning at 6:00 p.m.*
in the Council Chambers, 303 S. Clear.**
**[Meeting Agenda](https://sansabatexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/07/agenda070825.pdf)**

**Public Notice | Notice is hereby given that Ordinance No. 2025-06 was adopted at a Regular Called
Meeting, of the San Saba City Council, City of San Saba, Texas, on June 10, 2025.**
**[Read More…](https://sansabatexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/25-06-Notice-of-Ordinance-Passed-2025-06-Amending-Ordinance-No.-2009-06-Sex-Offender-.pdf)**

**The City Council of the City of San Saba, Texas, has scheduled its next regularly monthly meeting on
*Tuesday, June 10th, beginning at 6:00 p.m.*
in the Council Chambers, 303 S. Clear.**
**[Meeting Agenda](https://sansabatexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/agenda061025.pdf)**

**The City of San Saba, Texas, Texas Community Development Block Grant Program Notice of Final Public Hearing | The City of San Saba with conduct a public hearing to allow public comment on its Community Development Block Grant project #CDM22-0038 for its sidewalk improvement project. The intent of the public hearing is to review project performance and receive public comments. The public hearing is scheduled on
*Monday, June 9th, beginning at 5:05 p.m.*
in the Council Chambers, 303 S. Clear.**
**[Read More…](https://sansabatexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/Public-Hearing-Final-Block-Grant-Program-6-9-25.pdf)**

**The City Council Budget Workshop
*scheduled for May 20th*
in the Council Chambers, 303 S. Clear has been canceled and rescheduled for the next regularly scheduled council meeting on June 10th.**

**The City Council of the City of San Saba, Texas, has scheduled its next regularly monthly meeting on
*Tuesday, May 13th, beginning at 6:00 p.m.*
in the Council Chambers, 303 S. Clear.**
**[Meeting Agenda](https://sansabatexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/05/agenda051325.pdf)**

**The City Council of the City of San Saba, Texas, has scheduled its next regularly monthly meeting on
*Tuesday, April 8th, beginning at 6:00 p.m.*
in the Council Chambers, 303 S. Clear.**
**[Meeting Agenda](https://sansabatexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/04/agenda040825.pdf)**

**The City Council of the City of San Saba, Texas, has scheduled its next regularly monthly meeting on
*Tuesday, March 11th, beginning at 6:00 p.m.*
in the Council Chambers, 303 S. Clear.**
**[Meeting Agenda](https://sansabatexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/04/agenda031125.pdf)**

**The Planning & Zoning Commission of San Saba, Texas, will hold a Public Hearing prior to the meeting on
*Monday, February 27th, beginning at 12:00 p.m.*
in the Council Chambers, 303 S. Clear and the City Council will meet in Open Session on
*Tuesday, February 11, 2025, at 6:00 p.m.*
at City Hall Council Chambers to receive comments on a Zoning Variance.**
**[Public Notice & Meeting Agenda](https://sansabatexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/agenda022725.pdf)**

**Public Notice | Notice is hereby given that Ordinance No. 2025-01 was adopted at a Regular Called
Meeting, of the San Saba City Council, City of San Saba, Texas, on February 11, 2025.**
**[Read More…](https://sansabatexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/25-01-Notice-of-Ordinance-Passed-Updating-Adopting-2021-Codes.pdf)**

**The City Council of the City of San Saba, Texas, has scheduled its next regularly monthly meeting on
*Tuesday, February 11th, beginning at 6:00 p.m.*
in the Council Chambers, 303 S. Clear.**
**[Meeting Agenda](https://sansabatexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/agenda021125.pdf)**

**The Planning & Zoning Commission of San Saba, Texas, will meet in Open Session on
*Monday, January 27th, beginning at 12:00 p.m.*
in the Council Chambers, 303 S. Clear and the City Council will meet in Open Session on
*Tuesday, February 11, 2025, at 6:00 p.m.*
at City Hall Council Chambers to consider a Zoning Variance. Objections to these requests should be made at the listed meetings.**
**[Public Notice](https://sansabatexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/agenda012725.pdf)**
**[Meeting Agenda](https://sansabatexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/agenda012725-notice.pdf)**

**The City Council of the City of San Saba, Texas, has scheduled its next regularly monthly meeting on
*Tuesday, January 14th, beginning at 6:00 p.m.*
in the Council Chambers, 303 S. Clear.**
**[Meeting Agenda](https://sansabatexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/agenda011425.pdf)**
